评论概述: The Perfect Lightweight Jacket for Everyday!
评论详情: This jacket has become my absolute go-to! It’s super lightweight, comfortable, and versatile enough to pair with anything. The material feels great, and I love the thumb holes—they add a stylish touch while keeping the sleeves in place during workouts. It’s breathable yet keeps me warm on cooler days, making it perfect for layering. Plus, the fit is flattering, and I get compliments whenever I wear it. Highly recommend if you're looking for a stylish, functional, and comfortable jacket!

评论概述: Love this top! Perfect fit, perfect price 💲! (On sale 👍)
评论详情: Not too cropped at all, which is exactly what I feared, but didn’t happen 🙌. I went against any typical sizing I’d usually go with due to my bust size (34DD), any strayed away from the size chart provided, and I took a chance on an XS. Fits perfectly 👍! There’s a great amount of stretch & it’s not a really constricting fabric, so my girls aren’t getting squished & squashed, so if in any doubt.. size down, but definitely don’t go passed your regular shirt size! My gamble paid off PERFECTLY!  It’s a nice BBL dupe, since it’s fitted and styled in a certain way at the lower waist, that gives you a more curvy, snatched look. I’m happy since I can’t afford a true BBL until next winter 😢. My kids stole my hourglass bod, and I want it back, but I digress, lol. I got two of these here on sale, and I’m very happy to have gotten two tops for under $30. THAT is a deal. If it wasn’t almost springtime I’d buy more.  Overall, I’m happy & the thumb holes help hide my older looking hands that I hate. A worthy buy!  5 stars!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️  ** I hope my review has been helpful to you 😊. **

I got a size XS and S in two different colors and here are my thoughts:  For reference, I am 5'2, a true size small, athletic upper build, 27in waist, and the size small fit me more comfortably.  I got an XS because I wanted a fitted look, and it definitely snatched the mid section and it looked great shape wise, but the arms, chest and shoulder parts were too compressed and left marks in my skin when I removed the jacket. Funny enough, it didn't feel that uncomfortable when I had it on, but it did feel compressive, specially in the arms. The stomach/mid-section area was a perfect fit though.  When I got the size Small, this fit my arms, shoulders, and chest MUCH more comfortably, but it was not tight in the stomach area, so I was not getting that "snatched" shape/look. I typically lean more towards comfort, so I'd say size small fit me best.

评论概述: Lovely for the gym and flattering!
评论详情: First of all, I love the design of this jacket. It's sleek and modern, with a full zip and a high collar that provides extra warmth and protection from the elements. The thumb holes are a great addition, keeping the sleeves securely in place while allowing for maximum mobility during workouts or other activities.  The fabric is lightweight and breathable, making it perfect for a variety of activities, from running and hiking to yoga and weightlifting. It's also moisture-wicking, which is a must for any workout gear, ensuring that sweat doesn't build up and cause discomfort.  In terms of sizing, I found this jacket to be true to size. I usually wear a xL, and the xxL fit me perfectly. The length is just right, hitting at the hip, and the sleeves are the perfect length as well. I went up a size because I am tall and my arms are long  One thing to note is that this jacket is not very thick, so if you're looking for something to keep you warm in extremely cold temperatures, you may want to layer it with something else. However, for mild to moderate temperatures, it's a great option.  Overall, I highly recommend the jacket. It's a versatile and stylish piece of workout gear that is sure to become a staple in your athletic wardrobe.

评论概述: Everything about it is great, except the weird perfume smell that came with it

Idk if someone else wore it, sprayed it 1000x with perfume, then returned it, but I’ve washed this jacket about 30 times already and the smell will not go away. I didn’t return the item because it’s too much of a hassle and the fit is good. Hopefully yours doesn’t smell like mine LOL

I wear it all the time, it's been washed a couple times because I wear it so often, if you want the snatched effect definitely size down but I have noticed it get looser and baggy and I wash it in cold water and dry a low heat on the delicate cycle so I'm not really sure why that's happened. First off, this jacket is so comfy and lightweight - it's made of breathable, stretchy material that lets you move around freely. Plus, the thumb holes are lit and keep the sleeves in place while you're gettin' your sweat on.  What's really sick about this jacket is that you can wear it for all sorts of workouts - running, yoga, weightlifting, you name it - and it doubles as a casual jacket for everyday wear. It's easy to zip up and down and has two pockets for all your small stuff, like your phone or keys.  Bottom line: I'm stoked on the Gihuo Women's Athletic Full Zip Lightweight Workout Jacket with Thumb Holes. It's a steal for the price and it's become one of my favorite jackets for both workouts and chillin'
